title: New: George Maple X Slime – Began To Say
content:
This is absolute fire from London’s George Maple, teaming up with long time CitR favourite, Slime for Began To Say.

Delicately soulful, they push boundaries both in terms of their take on the ‘traditional pop song’, and through the immaculate production. Her first new track in almost a year, and the certainly the most we’ve heard from Slime in quite a while, here’s hoping we’ll get plenty more from both parties in 2014, and maybe even a continued collaboration.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
